nodes.text: Rosco Ross was a muscular Human male who served the Rebel Alliance during the Galactic Civil War. In 1 BBY, Rosco wanted to become a stormtrooper, but failed the entry exam. Bitter that he would never be able to serve the Galactic Empire, Rosco sought to hurt the Empire and joined the Alliance to Restore the Republic. He later went on to work with Rebel agent Jan Ors and Ris Waller on the luxury liner Star of Empire, where they recruited an Imperial officer named Kyle Katarn to join their cause.
In the audio adaptation of Dark Forces: Soldier for the Empire, he was voiced by Christopher Bloch.
